name: New Born Puppy
description: I designed this puppy via my Domestika ‘How to Knit a Puppy Course’.
sizes_available: Finished Size: Body length (not including the tail) measures 23cm/ 9in long
full_text: I designed this puppy via my Domestika ‘How to Knit a Puppy Course’. I changed the body and head shape slightly but the basics are still similar if you want to be taught, in your own time, how to knit it. In the course you’ll learn my finishing techniques and all important shaping techniques and for you there’s a 15% discount with the code CLAIRE_GARLAND-DISCOUNT tap the link below to learn more ⬇️ https://www.domestika.org/en/courses/2611-knitting-realistic-stuffed-animals-make-a-puppy-from-yarn/claire_garland
